item.description:
Salut, tout le monde, Wright and Meme were kind enough to invite us to their home in Lexington. On June 15, I will send the address to the members who will have registered by 3:00 PM. Please, bring something to eat or drink: crackers, cheese, bread, fruits, etc...

As usual, everyone's consideration will be expected for the hosts’ kindness. We will be able to stay until 9:00 P.M.

 

A bientôt,

Frantz

group.name: The Boston French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Rendez-vous Ã Lexington!
